summary: Marty Preston and Judd Travers must join together to clear the latter's name after he is accused of killing a man he once fought in a bar.
cast: Scott Wilson|Gerald McRaney|Jason Dolley|Ann Dowd|Bonnie Bartlett|Jordan Garrett|Kyle Chavarria|Taylor Momsen|Liberty Smith|Maura Kidwell|Judy Espy|Kari Ely|Jeff Dolan|Adrian Rice|Jim Deken|Jilanne Marie Klaus|Lawrence Arancio|Zach Zerna|J. Michael Nash|Rachel Winfree|Donna Northcott|Jared Sanz-Agero|BJ Averell|James Anthony|Susie Wall|William Burch|David Wassilak|Susanna Harter|Haley Kloess|Train Mayer|Alex Prakken|Tucker Wells
title: Saving Shiloh
